resources.string: Cleaning up history db, deleting records before timestamp: %s.
Cleaning up spam db, deleting %s records before timestamp: %s".
Number list is empty, nothing to import.
The number %s doesn\'t match the filter %s, skip.
The fixed country code is empty.

Supported tags when querying numbers:
- {cc}
  The country code.
- {domestic}
  The domestic part.
- {number}
  The full number, including both country code and domestic part, without leading + or 0s.
- {origin_number}
  The origin number that can contain leading + or 0s.

Supported tags when downloading database files:
- {year}
  The year, e.g.: 2024
- {month} {day}
  Single-digit number will be padded with leading zero, e.g.:
  {month}_{day} -> 01_02
- {month_index} {day_index}
  These values will be padded without leading zero, e.g.:
  {month}_{day} -> 1_2

For German users only.
The API document: https://phoneblock.net/phoneblock/api/

The call screening time limit is 5 seconds, with a %s ms buffer for the inaccuracy of time functions, the total time limit is actually %s ms. The previous steps cost %s ms, not enough time left, skip.
Generate a <u>list of numbers</u> that contains all spam numbers that were identified in the previous step.
